channel.title: [REQ] Make your player not move when ranging
channel.description: Well, whenever you for example attack a person with a bow, how do you make your player not walk at them? Or, when you use a spell, how can you prevent yourself from walking?

item.title: [REQ] Make your player not move when ranging

item.description:
@Trigun wrote:

Well, whenever you for example attack a person with a bow, how do you make your player not walk at them? Or, when you use a spell, how can you prevent yourself from walking?
